Sentinel-of-Acheron.name: Sentinel of Acheron
description: @+Sentinels of Acheron+@ are otherworldly beings of cosmic energy that live in the divine realm of the Astral Sea and Elysium.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
abilities.text: If the void horror fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.text: The Sentinel of Acheron makes two attacks with its lance.

actions.name: Lance.
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) radiant damage.
